query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS testimonials (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customerName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customerPhoto VARCHAR(500),
  rating INT NOT NULL CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
  quote TEXT NOT NULL,
  productId INT,
  featured BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2AMhEi8cqa88xW3.root --database 2ikumxMtkpq6y45BuCae8B --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS testimonials (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customerName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customerPhoto VARCHAR(500),
  rating INT NOT NULL CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
  quote TEXT NOT NULL,
  productId INT,
  featured BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
